text: Motion

I see...
For the track team...

From what I gathered during the interview,
it seems like they'd understand if she wanted to do both.

The captain of the track team seems nice from
what Kaho and the others said, but... she seems hesitant herself.

It's like it just "came to her"...!
That means she must really like it!
It's okay to "challenge" yourself anytime...

Surely...
There are feelings that are not easily expressed...

Indeed... with so much expectation placed on her art,
she might feel she can't slack off in the art club either.
Motion

But...
to hold back such... fervor...
...I wouldn't want her to have regrets.
I'm... torn.

I don't want to negate the Club President's
thoughtful decision she's made...

But... passion... or something like that,
suppressing that feeling feels... different, I guess.

...That's why I want to suggest to the
Club President to try out for the track team.

So...
I want everyone's help with this.
Kaho, Chiyoko, Rinze, and Natsuha
Yes!

Yeah...!
Let's do it, Juri-chan!
Hehe...

Let's think about it!
What we can do together!
Thanks, everyone.

Well then!
Let's start the strategy meeting!
